io.micronaut.context.exceptions

Class BeanCreationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.micronaut.context.exceptions.BeanContextException
            • io.micronaut.context.exceptions.BeanCreationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeanInstantiationException, DependencyInjectionException

    public abstract class BeanCreationException
extends BeanContextException
    A base class for exceptions that occurred during bean creation.
    Since:
    2.0.2
    Author:
    James Kleeh
